content: this legal text provides a summary of a specific case referred to as case n° 24332021 without disclosing the names of the parties involved the case involves two parties with the first party being ordered to pay a certain amount of money initially they were ordered to pay €3777 but this amount increased to €5615 in the second degree the case lasted for seven years from september 20 2014 to june 25 2021 the text explains that a judicial division was made to allocate assets in favor of the actor with the shares of the inheritance and immovable property being confirmed and given to the children however the fathers claim was rejected the text also mentions that the appellants who are coheirs appealed against a partial decision made by the lower court they argued that there was a conflict of interest and disputed the lower courts findings regarding the acceptance of the inheritance and the restitution of certain sums of money and assets the court of appeal upheld some aspects of the lower courts decision and ordered a retrial in others the court also ruled on the allocation of legal costs

metadata.cost: 3.777,00 EUR in first degree and 5615,00 EUR in second degree
